description:
### 8.11 adecorrelate

Apply decorrelation to input audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

**stages**

    Set decorrelation stages of filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 6. 

**seed**

    Set random seed used for setting delay in samples across channels.
name: adecorrelate

options.description: Set decorrelation stages of filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 6.
options.name: stages

options.description: Set random seed used for setting delay in samples across channels.
options.name: seed
